abstractText: This small-size black-paper manuscript containing the Mahāsaṃvarahṛdayadhāraṇī has the peculiarity of being written in inks of three different colours: gold, bronze and silver.
abstractShort: This small-size black-paper manuscript containing the Mahāsaṃvarahṛdayadhāraṇī has the peculiarity of being written in inks
title: Mahāsaṃvarahṛdayadhāraṇī
